<Text: Jean-Baptiste Senaillé:  His father was a member of Les Vingt-quatre Violons du Roi.>

<Jean-Baptiste Senaillé
3:
<Text: Jean-Baptiste Senaillé:  He wrote around 50 violin sonatas.>
Triplets:<Jean-Baptiste Senaillé
4:
--------------------
Text: Jean-Baptiste Senaillé:  He is most well known for a fast 2/4 movement from one of these sonatas, "Allegro Spiritoso", which has had versions published transcribed for a wide variety of instruments, from violoncello to bassoon to euphonium.
Triplets:<Jean-Baptiste Senaillé
